EmailTemplate.name: 06-10-22 BNK Connect Mag V2 Issue 2 SEA.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: It’s here – latest CONNECT Magazine
EmailTemplate.textOnly: We are delighted to share with you our June edition of CONNECT Magazine where we discuss the current industry trends. Check out our latest issue where we look at the impact crypto, embedded finance and customer experience can have on financial institutions. Plus we talk to Intel on their approach to As a Service and explore how Ethiopia’s Bank of Abyssinia has developed a new branch concept to drive financial inclusion. Read it today – and to make it even easier there’s no form to fill in! ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> To read past issues click here <[[https://www.ncr.com/banking/connect-magazine-q2-2022/thank-you?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Other&utm_campaign=2022_June_ConnectMagV2-Issue2_Banking&utm_content=Email1&utm_industry=banking&utm_sub-industry=]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
